title: Attack on Titan
description: A battle for humanity against terrifying Titans. Eren Yeager and his friends join the Survey Corps to uncover the secrets of their world.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja, dreams of becoming the Hokage and earning the respect of his village.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out on a grand adventure to find the legendary treasure, One Piece, and become the King of the Pirates.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado embarks on a journey to save his sister and defeat the demons that threaten humanity.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori becomes involved in the world of Jujutsu Sorcerers after ingesting a powerful cursed object.
